caller_intent: The caller (Corbin from Alliance Insurance) wanted to change a client's billing mode from semiannual to annual for a policy.
resolution_steps: Dana verified the client's account details (policy number, insurance name, agency code).
Dana guided Corbin to the 'payment schedule' section in the system to change the billing mode to 'full pay' (annual).
Dana confirmed the change would take 3-5 days to process and apply the discount.
Corbin confirmed the change was successfully saved in the system.
knowledge_required: Understanding of AutoOwners Insurance's billing system and payment schedule modification process.
Ability to verify client account details and guide users through policy adjustments.
summary: Corbin from Alliance Insurance requested assistance changing a client's billing mode from semiannual to annual. Dana verified the client's account details and guided Corbin through the AutoOwners system to update the payment schedule. The change was successfully implemented, with a 3-5 day processing window for the discount to take effect.
